sentences.english: He goes out in the rain, he walks in the water, he travels in winter.
sentences.chinese: 他常在下雨时出门，在水里行走，在严冬旅行。

sentences.english: A Good Winter Brings a Good Summ.
Lying within the South Temperate Zone, New Zealand has an oceanic climate, without extremes of heat or cold.
sentences.chinese: 新西兰地处南温带，属海洋性气候，没有严冬和酷署。

sentences.english: Defying cold of winter through the snow.
My 80-year-old grandfather can not bear the severe winter in the North.
sentences.chinese: 我80岁的爷爷无法忍受北方的严冬。

sentences.english: That winter where you are on the stove, heat inside the shade.
sentences.chinese: 您就那严冬里的火炉，酷暑里的浓荫。

sentences.english: The long cruel winter came to an end at last, yielding to a gentle warm.
sentences.chinese: 漫长的严冬终于接近尾声，被柔和温暖的气候所取代。

sentences.english: The asperity of the winter had everybody yearning for spring.
sentences.chinese: 严冬之苦让每个人都渴望春天。

sentences.english: Hope and dreams keep the cold winter green.
sentences.chinese: 希望与梦想，使酷寒严冬依然绿意盎然。

sentences.english: Everything that the sever winter takes, early spring will give you return.
sentences.chinese: 严冬掠去的一切，新春会给你还来。

sentences.english: The little tree has weathered several bitter winters.
sentences.chinese: 这棵小树经受了好几个严冬。

sentences.english: If Winter gos, can Spring be far ago?
sentences.chinese: 严冬既已至，春天即不远。

sentences.english: Only last year, Europe’s severe winter freezing was called the worst in memory.
sentences.chinese: 一年前，欧洲的那个严冬被人称作记忆中最糟的冬天。

sentences.english: In the autumn，by the thousands，they come home for the winter.
sentences.chinese: 秋季，它们会成百上千地在这里筑窝，躲过严冬。

sentences.english: Hopes and dreams keep the cold winter green.
sentences.chinese: 希望与梦想，使酷寒严冬，依然绿意盎然。

definition: cold weather, frozen ground (idiom); bitterly cold
nine periods of nine days each after winter solstice, the coldest time of the year
The north wind is icy cold.
a world of ice and snow
